channel.title: Build a Website Ready to Present on Golden Idea Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Build a Website Ready to Present on Golden Idea Theme

item.title: About Golden Idea Theme
item.description: Golden Idea theme is a theme to build a website quickly to introduce your ideas or project. You can present from the published web page, or export the page as a local file for presentation. Repo for this theme: https://github.com/golden-idea/golden-idea.github.io This theme is used in the documentation site of Go and Talk page builder. How to Use This Theme Hosting With Github Pages create an organization fork repository to this organization, and rename repository to [orgname].

item.title: Go and Talk Page Builder
item.description: Hover on the left edge of the screen to manage sites and pages, or load remote data. Hover on the top edge of a section to manage the section.
